demo_script.name: Interactive Pipulate Demo
demo_script.description: An interactive demo that responds to keyboard input and branches based on user choices

steps.message: This is {app_name}, local first AI SEO automation software. Would you like a demo? Press **Ctrl+Alt+y** or **Ctrl+Alt+n** on the keyboard.

ollama_messages.available: You hit yes! Hi, I'm Chip O'Theseus the local LLM built into {app_name}. Is it okay if I speak out loud to you? **Ctrl+Alt+y** / **Ctrl+Alt+n**
ollama_messages.not_available: You hit yes but you still need to install Ollama with Gemma 3. Would you like to proceed anyway with limited LLM assistance and me speaking out loud to you? **Ctrl+Alt+y** / **Ctrl+Alt+n**

branch_no.message: Back to our regularly scheduled program.

tool_args.text: Welcome to the Great and Secret AI SEO Show! I'm Chip O'Theseus, your local AI assistant, and I'm delighted to speak with you today! At any time you can chat to me here.

branch_dev_yes.description: 🎤 Chip O'Theseus speaks his first words
✨ Twinkling the chat input with gold magic

tool_args.text: Press control alt y to continue.

branch_dev_yes.message: For my first trick I will **Reset Entire DEV Database** to blank the sample demo data. Is that okay? **Ctrl+Alt+y** / **Ctrl+Alt+n**

ollama_messages.available: Thank you. I will be here to answer any of your questions when you need. And you can always restart the demo with Ctrl+Alt+D at any time.
ollama_messages.not_available: Thank you. You can always restart the demo with Ctrl+Alt+D at any time. Visit ollama.com for local LLM installation instructions.
